text: The 2019–20 Continental Cup was the 23rd edition of the IIHF Continental Cup, Europe's second-tier ice hockey club competition organised by International Ice Hockey Federation. The season started on 20 September 2019 and the final tournament was played from 10 to 12 January 2020. ==Qualified teams== {| class="wikitable" |- !Team !Qualification |- !colspan=2|Enter in the third round |- | Neman Grodno |2018 Belarusian Cup winners |- | SønderjyskE Ishockey |2018–19 Metal Ligaen runners-up |- | Gothiques d'Amiens |2018–19 Coupe de France winners |- | Nottingham Panthers |2018–19 EIHL season third place |- | Beibarys Atyrau |2018–19 Kazakhstan Hockey Championship champions |- | Cracovia |2018–19 Polska Hokej Liga runners-up |- !colspan=2|Enter in the second round |- | Ferencvárosi TC |2018–19 OB I bajnokság champions |- | Ritten Sport |2018–19 IHL - Elite champions |- | Mogo Riga |2018–19 Latvian Hockey Higher League champions |- | Corona Brașov |2018–19 Romanian Hockey League champions |- | Olimpija Ljubljana |2018–19 Slovenian Ice Hockey League champions |- | HC Donbass |2018–19 Ukrainian Hockey League champions |- !colspan=2|Enter in the first round |- | HYC Herentals |2018–19 BeNe League champions |- | Irbis-Skate Sofia |2018–19 Bulgarian Hockey League champions |- | KHL Zagreb |2018–19 Croatian Ice Hockey League champions |- | Skautafélag Akureyrar |2018–19 Icelandic Hockey League champions |- | HC Bat Yam |2018–19 Israeli Hockey League champions |- | Crvena Zvezda |2018–19 Serbian Hockey League champions |- | Txuri Urdin |2018–19 Liga Nacional de Hockey Hielo champions |- | Zeytinburnu Belediyespor |2018–19 Turkish Ice Hockey Super League champions |} ==First round== ===Group A=== The Group A tournament was played in Istanbul, Turkey, from 20 to 22 September 2019. All times are local (UTC+3). ===Group B=== The Group B tournament was played in Mechelen, Belgium, from 20 to 22 September 2019. All times are local (UTC+2). ==Second round== ===Group C=== The Group C tournament was played in Brovary, Ukraine, from 18 to 20 October 2019. All times are local (UTC+3). ===Group D=== The Group D tournament was played in Ritten, Italy, from 18 to 20 October 2019. All times are local (UTC+2). ==Third round== ===Group E=== The Group E tournament was played in Vojens, Denmark, from 15 to 17 November 2019. All times are local (UTC+1). ===Group F=== The Group F tournament was played in Kraków, Poland, from 15 to 17 November 2019. All times are local (UTC+1). ==Final round== Continental Cup Final tournament was played in Vojens, Denmark, from 10 to 12 January 2020. All times are local (UTC+1). ==See also== * 2019–20 Champions Hockey League ==References== Category:IIHF Continental Cup Category:2019–20 in European ice hockey
title: 2019–20 IIHF Continental Cup
